DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine whether AL-15469A is safe and effective in the treatment of bacterial conjunctivitis.
DOC.brief_title: AL-15469A for the Treatment of Bacterial Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: signs and symptoms of bacterial conjunctivitis Other protocoldefined inclusion criteria may apply under 1 mo. age Other protocoldefined exclusion criteria may apply
